sect1.title: Creating a File System on the Partition
sect1.para: Now that a blank partition has been set up, the file system can be created. The most widely-used system in the Linux world is the second extended file system (ext2), but with the newer high-capacity hard disks, the journaling file systems are becoming increasingly popular.
